# Contributing to Swiparr

Thank you for your interest in Swiparr.

## Pull Requests

At this time, I am **not accepting Pull Requests**. I want to keep the codebase tightly managed for the time being. Any PRs opened will likely be closed without review.

## Discussions and Feedback

I would love to hear your thoughts, ideas, and bug reports! Please use the [Discussions](https://github.com/messerstudios/swiparr/discussions) tab on GitHub to:

- Ask for help or support.
- Propose new features.
- Share how you're using Swiparr.
- Report bugs.

I appreciate your understanding and look forward to hearing from you in the discussions.
